alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bradford, south central Baker and northeastern Union Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raiford. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Raiford, Johnstown and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
